title: Filing of Nominations for DFA/RFA Chairman, Executive Committee elections set to close of Thursday October 22
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 18:42 CET Filing of Nominations for DFA/RFA Chairman, Executive Committee elections set to close of Thursday October 22 By Ghana FA 
Pursuant to the time table of for the 2015 GFA elections, we wish to remind the general public that the nominations for the Regional Executive Committee, District Football Association Chairman and DFA Executive Committee which opened on Friday 16th October , will close on Thursday, 22nd October, 2015. 
In accordance to Article 54 of the GFA Statutes, all RFAs must elect: 
• Five (5) persons from Second Division Clubs• Three (3) persons from Third and Fourth Division Clubs 
• Two (2) persons from Juvenile Football Clubs• One (1) person from Women Football Clubs• One (1) person from Referees and• One (1) person from CoachesInterested affiliates can pick nomination forms at their RFA secretariat between 8:00hrs and 17:00hrs on the above specified dates at a fee of One Hundred Cedis (GH¢100.00) only. 
All nominations shall be accompanied by a fee of Five Hundred Ghana Cedis (GH¢500.00). 
All RFAs are expected to assist the GFA Elections Committee to organize the above mentioned elections in accordance with the GFA Regulations.
